      • visit

        public boolean visit(LineSegment segment)
        Description copied from interface: Visitor
        Visit an item of type T, performing some operation on the item. The method must return true if further items are to be processed or false if no further items are to be processed.
        Specified by:
        visit in interface Visitor<LineSegment>
        Overrides:
        visit in class RayCrossingCounter
        Parameters:
        segment - The item to process.
        Returns:
        True if further items are to be processed, false otherwise.
